mapper.sql: id, user_id, p_user_id, num, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, del_flag
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_user_agency
id,
user_id,
p_user_id,
num,
create_time,
update_time,
create_by,
update_by,
del_flag,

mapper.update:
update tb_user_agency
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
p_user_id = #{pUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_user_agency set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_user_id = #{pUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update tb_user_agency set num = num+1 where user_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(0) from tb_user_agency where p_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select user_id from tb_user_agency where p_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.user_id ,b.head_image,b.nick_name,b.create_time,b.user_name from tb_user_agency as a LEFT JOIN tb_user as b on a.user_id =b.id where a.p_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_time desc
